timeAtRisks.description: Intention-to-treat: 1 day after admission to first of outcome, loss to follow-up, or 30 days

targetCohort.name: Adults with T2D initiating semaglutide, dulaglutide, exenatide, empagliflozin, sitagliptin, or glipizide

comparatorCohort.name: Adults with T2D initiating comparator T2D medication

timeAtRisks.description: From drug initiation until end of continuous exposure (gap >30 days or end of observation)
On-treatment: from day after cohort entry until switch, outcome, >30d gap, disenrollment, or study end

psSettings.description: Sentinel PS strategy: 1:1 matching, caliper 0.05 on PS scale
Large-scale regularized regression PS: 1:10 matching, caliper 0.2 on standardized logit

timeAtRisks.description: On-treatment (OT): index date to end of treatment (days supply + 30-day permissible gap), censored at death, database exit, age 89, 365 days post-index, or exposure to other opioid
Intent-to-treat (ITT): index date to death, database exit, or outcome
On-treatment: day after index until end of persistent exposure

psSettings.description: PS 1: 1:10 variable ratio matching, greedy, caliper 0.2 SD logit
